bug.author: cnewton
bug.summary: Playing wave form rendering scales overlay with play position in AudioPlus
bug.description:
The wave form rendering view seems to scale the wave form against the current time position, which results in an odd looking play experience: <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/2302559/72746945-620c1380-3b81-11ea-803d-96c4e2ca8bc5.gif></denchmark-link>
Audio pictured is /static/samples/game.wav. Reproducible in both Firefox 72 and Chrome 79 on Windows.
